title: [Wool Fashion Awards, 1965 and 1966]
brief_description: Models show a variety of garments which won the Fashion Awards for 1966. Knitted jumpers, suits, skirts, and day and evening dresses, ensembles and coats. Photographed at Eltham using Montsalvat as a background.
